mapper.insert: insert into COUPON (COUPON_NM, COUPON_CNTNTS, COUPON_DSCNT, COUPON_BEGIN_DE, COUPON_END_DE) values (#{coupon_nm}, #{coupon_cntnts}, #{coupon_dscnt}, #{coupon_begin_de}, #{coupon_end_de})
mapper.select: select * from coupon_hold ch, coupon c where ch.user_id = #{user_id} and ch.COUPONHOLD_USE_AT = 'no' and ch.coupon_code = c.coupon_code
